Name: Average time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants containing both activities
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to occur after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 in cases that eventually reach SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time elapsed from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to SW-AE Assign Reviewers in variants where SW-Reviewer Agreed does not occur within 7 days
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total resolution time of the interval starting with Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 and ending with either SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer No Response
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to SW-Reviewer Selection is now due in variants exhibiting delayed reviewer assignment
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'

Name: Minimum time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 and the next occurrence of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2, indicating escalation timing
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in end-to-end review cycles that include at least one reviewer agreement
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average cycle time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 when followed by SW-Reviewer Agreed versus when followed by SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 and SW-EIC Major Revision in variants that undergo major revision after initial reviewer agreement
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Time elapsed from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to Manuscript Export Succeeded in successful submission-to-publication paths
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Average time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to occur after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 in comparison to the time it takes SW-Reviewer Declined to occur after the same reminder
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to SW-AE Recommendation overdue in cases where AE recommendation is significantly delayed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-AE Recommendation overdue'

Name: Average waiting time to SW-Reviewer Agreed following Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1, grouped by case:concept:name
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'", 'end': "activity == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'", 'aggregation': 'average', 'group_by': 'concept:name'}"
